markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 334 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Deities** [Ah Pook](/Deities.aspx?ID=327), [Aonaurious](/Deities.aspx?ID=581), [Apep](/Deities.aspx?ID=631), [Charon](/Deities.aspx?ID=391), [Cthulhu](/Deities.aspx?ID=569), [Dajermube](/Deities.aspx?ID=338), [Fumeiyoshi](/Deities.aspx?ID=305), [Iggeret](/Deities.aspx?ID=597), [Neshen](/Deities.aspx?ID=478), [Nhimbaloth](/Deities.aspx?ID=572), [Nulgreth](/Deities.aspx?ID=558), [Nyarlathotep (Haunter in the Dark)](/Deities.aspx?ID=684), [Orcus](/Deities.aspx?ID=241), [Treerazer](/Deities.aspx?ID=324) **Area** 30-foot line **Defense** Fortitude --- Tendrils of darkness curl out from your fingertips and race through the air. You deal 2d4 void damage and 1 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to living creatures in the line. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half the void damage and no persistent bleed damage.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage.
**Critical Failure** The creature takes double void damage and double persistent bleed damage. --- **Heightened (+1)** The void damage increases by 2d4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.
name: Grim Tendrils

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Area** 30-foot line

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Fortitude

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Creatures in a line take void damage and start to bleed.
</summary>
summary: Creatures in a line take void damage and start to bleed.
summary_markdown: Creatures in a line take void damage and start to bleed.
text: Grim Tendrils Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 334 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Ah Pook, Aonaurious, Apep, Charon, Cthulhu, Dajermube, Fumeiyoshi, Iggeret, Neshen, Nhimbaloth, Nulgreth, Nyarlathotep (Haunter in the Dark), Orcus, Treerazer Area 30-foot line Defense Fortitude --- Tendrils of darkness curl out from your fingertips and race through the air. You deal 2d4 void damage and 1 persistent bleed damage to living creatures in the line. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature takes half the void damage and no persistent bleed damage. Failure The creature takes full damage. Critical Failure The creature takes double void damage and double persistent bleed damage. --- Heightened (+1) The void damage increases by 2d4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.
